summary.Title: Serviceminded cashier for our store in Copenhagen
summary.JobHeadline: Serviceminded cashier for our store in Copenhagen
summary.Presentation:
Ria is looking for a new part-time cashier to join our retail team in Copenhagen.

Process money transfer  orders and foreign

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Serviceminded cashier for our store in Copenhagen
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Ria is looking for a new part-time cashier to join our retail team in Copenhagen.

Customer´s Service

  • Process money transfer  orders and foreign exchange  with speed, accuracy and tact
  • Provide information about Ria Services to customers
  • Resolve orders incidences working together with Customer Service department

Till organization, controls and Compliance

  • Organize the level of stocks and balance his/her own till quickly and without mistakes.
  • Be present at the assigned counter position at all times when on duty to serve Customers.
  • Keep the till ordered at all the times.
  • Check daily reports.
  • Implement the Company established procedures to accomplish regulations, AML and Security in the Work Place

Business orientation

  • Maximize daily foreign exchange revenues.
  • Promote and sell pro-actively all products offered by the Company.
  • Maximize cross-selling opportunities

 Qualifications 

  • Minimum 6 months cash-handling experience is required
  • One year of work experience in customer service and/or cashiers positions
  • Customer Service and Commercial focused 
  • Knowledge in other languages is a plus.

 

Your Place at RiaYou’ll grow alongside a multicultural team where diversity is not just a fancy term we throw around. We started out as a small immigrant-made business with one simple mission: to help people like us stay connected to their loved ones around the world. Although we’re now a global fintech with offices all over the world, we’ve stayed true to our roots. We are down-to-earth people who are from everywhere and comfortable just about anywhere. Together, we believe we can create a world in which people are empowered to build the life they dream of, no matter who they are or where they are. This idea of helping to open ways for a better everyday life is what drives us to continue doing our best each day. The Ria DNA is made up of four main pillars:     humility, openness, transparency, and drive. This powerful combination allows us to do right by our customers and colleagues. We are people serving people and we never, ever forget that.
